ForearmsBBReverseCurl.name: Barbell Reverse Curl
ForearmsBBReverseCurl.preparation: Grasp bar with shoulder width overhand grip.
ForearmsBBReverseCurl.execution: With elbows to side, raise bar until forearms are vertical. Lower until arms are fully extended. Repeat.
ForearmsBBReverseCurl.comments: When elbows are fully flexed, they can travel forward slightly, allowing forearms to be no more than vertical. This additional movement allows for relative release of tension in muscles between repetitions.

ForearmsBBReversePreacherCurl.name: Barbell Reverse Preacher Curl
ForearmsBBReversePreacherCurl.preparation: Sit on preacher bench placing back of arms on pad. Grasp curl bar with shoulder width overhand grip.
ForearmsBBReversePreacherCurl.execution: Raise bar until forearms are vertical. Lower barbell until arm is fully extended. Repeat.
ForearmsBBReversePreacherCurl.comments: Seat should be adjusted to allow arm pit to rest near top of pad. Back of upper arm should remain on pad.

ForearmsBBStandingReversePreacherCurl.name: Barbell Standing Reverse Preacher Curl
ForearmsBBStandingReversePreacherCurl.preparation: Place back of arms on pad with one foot forward. Grasp curl bar with shoulder width underhand grip.
ForearmsBBStandingReversePreacherCurl.execution: Raise bar until forearms are vertical. Lower barbell until arm is fully extended. Repeat.
ForearmsBBStandingReversePreacherCurl.comments: Body should be positioned to allow arm pit to rest near top of pad. Back of upper arm should remain on pad.
